review:
this is one of the best comedy movies i've ever gone through in my life. 
despite the movie running for almost 3 hours, i bet, you won't be bored for a second. 
this movie is there to be in that evergreen genre. 
watched it after 12 years of release and i am like, where the hell have i been, all those years?
one of my favourite movies.good story based on men having extra marital affairs but at the end get devoted to their wives.all the actors work is good
